'''A Procession of Bonfires''' is [[Yoimiya]]'s [[Level 2 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*The [[Damage Bonus/Pyro|Pyro DMG Bonus]] buff provided by this Constellation does not stack when Yoimiya scores a CRIT Hit multiple times during this effect's duration.
